Core functionality of `pander` is centered around `pandoc.table` which is aimed at rendering tables in `markdown`. `pandoc.table` has big variety of options ((caption)[#caption], (formats)[#formats], etc.) and this vignette aims to give a more details overview of most common options.

## Formats/Style/Flavour

Since `pander` aims at rendering R objects into [Pandoc](http://pandoc.org/)'s markdown all four [Pandoc](http://johnmacfarlane.net/pandoc/README.html#tables) formats are supported.
